actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment within the Federal Aviation Administration of an Associate Administrator for the National Airways System Plan.

summary.text: Establishes in the Federal Aviation Administration the position of Associate Administrator for the National Airways System Plan. Makes it the duty of such Administrator to review, revise, publish, and implement such plan. Sets a ten-year term of office.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment within the Federal Aviation Administration of an Associate Administrator for the National Airways System Plan.
